functions.fetchData: (htmlContent, cheerio, SectionTitles) => { if (!htmlContent) { console.error('No HTML content to parse'); return []; } const $ = cheerio.load(htmlContent); const sections = []; const topWeekSection = $('div#owl-slider.owl-carousel') .first() .children('div.item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.slide-caption h3 a').attr('title'), author: '', image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.slide-caption h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: [], }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: SectionTitles.TopWeek, books: topWeekSection, }); const latestSection = $('div.panel-content-homepage') .first() .children('div.content-homepage-item') .map((index, element) => { return { title: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right h3 a').attr('title'), author: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right span.item-author').text(), image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).find('div.content-homepage-item-right h3 a').attr('href'), description: '', chapters: $(element) .find('p.item-chapter') .map((chapIndex, chapElement) => { return { title: $(chapElement).find('a').text(), url: $(chapElement).find('a').attr('href'), date: null, pages: [], }; }) .get(), }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: SectionTitles.NewReleases, books: latestSection, }); const newMangasSection = $('div.panel-newest-content') .first() .children('a') .map((index, element) => { return { title: '', author: '', image: $(element).find('img').attr('src'), url: $(element).attr('href'), description: '', chapters: [], }; }) .get(); sections.push({ title: SectionTitles.NewReleases, books: newMangasSection, }); console.log('Sections : ', sections); return sections; }
